p: It was found that C. fistula treatment reduced the promastigote proliferation in a time- and dose-dependent manner. The IC 50 value of C. fistula leaf methanolic extract was determined by incubating the parasites at different concentrations including 250, 125, 62.5, 31.25, 15.62, 7.81, and 3.90 μg/mL. By extrapolating the dose–response curve, the IC 50 value was found to be 43.31 ± 4.202 μg/mL ( Figure 5 B).
